scripts.prepare: yarn workspaces foreach -Wt --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients run prepare
scripts.recompile: yarn workspaces foreach -Wt --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients run recompile
scripts.watch: yarn workspaces foreach -Api --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients run watch
scripts.artefacts: yarn run prepare && yarn workspaces foreach -Wt --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients pack --install-if-needed --out ../../artefacts/%s-%v.tgz && yarn workspaces foreach -Wt --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients pack --install-if-needed --out ../../artefacts/%s-dev.tgz
scripts.update-deps: yarn upgrade-interactive && yarn dedupe && yarn sdks vscode
scripts.update-yarn: yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn dedupe && yarn sdks vscode
scripts.update-all: yarn run update-yarn && yarn run update-deps
